thread.title: AT&T Names New Regional Business Sales Leader in Mid-Atlantic

author: cnbc.com
title: AT&T Names New Regional Business Sales Leader in Mid-Atlantic
text:
CHARLOTTE, N.C., Feb. 7, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- AT&T* is appointing Judy Dobies director and general manager (GM) – National Business for the Mid-Atlantic region.
In this role, Judy will oversee sales to small and midsized business customers in Delaware, Maryland, North Carolina, Virginia, Washington, D.C. and West Virginia. Judy will lead a team responsible for delivering a full range of technology solutions.
Judy joined AT&T in 2000 as an account manager. Since then, she has held various management positions in technical support, coaching and sales. Her responsibilities have ranged from managing technical product sales to driving quality and process management initiatives. Judy has consistently been recognized for her sales success and has been identified as an extraordinary leader. Judy lives in Charlotte with her husband and three sons.
AT&T is appointing more than a dozen GM leaders in markets across the U.S. and hiring hundreds of additional frontline sellers to support them. Small and midsized businesses are the heart of our communities. And AT&T is committed to helping them grow.
AT&T currently has more than 250,000 employees, with more than 11,500 in the Mid-Atlantic.
*About AT&T
AT&T Inc. (NYSE:T) helps millions around the globe connect with leading entertainment, business, mobile and high speed internet services. We have the nation's largest and most reliable network** and the best global coverage of any U.S. wireless provider. We're one of the world's largest providers of pay TV. We have TV customers in the U.S. and 11 Latin American countries. Nearly 3.5 million companies, from small to large businesses around the globe, turn to AT&T for our highly secure smart solutions.
AT&T products and services are provided or offered by subsidiaries and affiliates of AT&T Inc. under the AT&T brand and not by AT&T Inc. Additional information about AT&T products and services is available at about.att.com . Follow our news on Twitter at @ATT, on Facebook at facebook.com/att and on YouTube at youtube.com/att .
